content.p: Professor, in the past I have taught many Mechanical Engineering subjects including, Engineering Drawing, Statics, Dynamics, Strength of Materials, Theory of Machines, Mechanics of Materials and Numericalâ€¦ read more Biomass for energy, Pyrolysis and Gasification, Solar thermal, Thermoacoustics.
